title: Hundreds protest in Sacramento over Clark's autopsy
text:
Hundreds protest in Sacramento over Clark's autopsy Saturday, March 31, 2018 - 01:39 
Hundreds protested in Sacramento overnight in anger over an autopsy report showing that the eight bullets that hit 22-year-old Stephon Clark did not hit him in the front. Clark's family attorney said the findings refute police statements that Clark was moving toward officers in a threatening way when they fired. Colette Luke has more.
